nodes.bodyText: Could you comment what this is for

I added what it does.
Currently, the only reason to separate this method is to move a part of the logic of the code in a separate function.
On longer term, the goal is to compute as much as possible in background, so that the card content can be shown immediately, instead of needing time to load the webview. But I don't expect that this explanation should appear in the code comment right now
The rest seems fine but I do not understand this import, it does not appear to be used in this PR, either this commit or following ones?
Probably imported automatically because of a typo. I'll delete
Probably imported automatically because of a typo. I'll delete later
